title: Fiji Oceanfront Laidback Luxury with Two Swimming Pools
description: Stay in the heart of Fiji's capital city when you check-in at Holiday Inn Suva, an IHG Hotel, an oceanfront island hideaway. When you're not exploring the sights of one of the largest cities in the South Pacific, enjoy some downtime cooling off in the hotel's outdoor or indoor swimming pool. When hunger strikes, Sirocco Restaurant serves up a mouthwatering array of Mediterranean-inspired dining options. Be sure to secure a seat on the outdoor deck in time for sunset and live music shows.
location_description: Holiday Inn Suva, an IHG Hotel

title: Fiji Novotel Lami Bay Luxury near Suva with Onsite Restaurant & Gin Lounge
description:
Uncover the serene beauty of Fiji's Lami Bay with a stay at this waterfront gem. This tranquil retreat offers panoramic views of the South Pacific Ocean, while its spacious rooms provide a comfortable haven after a day of exploration. Savour the flavours of the Pacific Rim at Husk Restaurant or sample from a wide selection of gins at Tonique Gin Lounge. 

With Suva's city centre, the Fiji Museum, and Colo-I-Suva Forest Park within easy reach, you'll find endless opportunities for adventure and discovery. Discover Fiji, relax in peaceful surroundings, eat delicious food, feel pampered - all is possible for your Fiji vacation.
offer_address: Queens Road Lami Bay, Suva, Fiji
